amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding, by offset, for the National Nuclear Security Administration by $192,123,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding (by transfer) for the National Nuclear Security Administration by $192.123 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Udall (NM) amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 121 - 312 (Roll no. 518).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A018) offered by Mr. Udall (NM).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
